resources.string:
(https://github.com/kubre/Voice-Sample-Collector) License GPL-3.0

 This app is initially created for the research students and fellows for the collection voice/audio samples in various frequencies according to their research need.
 Feel free to add or suggest new features at github page. Report security related problems at security@kubre.in

The App uses following:
Android AppCompat Library V7
 The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt 

 Androidx Ktx Library
 The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt 


Constraintlayout Library The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt 


Material Design Library
 https://github.com/material-components/material-components-android
 The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt 


Material Icons
 https://github.com/google/material-design-icons
 The Apache Software License, Version 2.0
 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt 


Om Recorder
 (https://github.com/kailash09dabhi/OmRecorder)
